items.question: We're not ready yet. Should I get the checker?
items.answer: Absolutely. The best time to plan is 6–12 months before you're ready. The tool helps you prepare so you're in position when the time comes.

items.question: Why only East Singapore?
items.answer: I'd rather be excellent in one area than average everywhere. My network, knowledge, and off-market access are concentrated here—better results for you.

items.question: Do I need to sell my HDB first?
items.answer: Not necessarily. Many clients buy first, then sell. I'll help structure the timeline so you're never homeless or overextended.

items.question: What if you say it's not the right time?
items.answer: Then I'll explain why, and we'll plan for when it makes sense. I'd rather earn your trust than push you into something wrong.
